text:
e="preserve">Bernhardus “Bernhard” van Haersma Buma (23 March 1932 – 26 June 2020) was a Dutch politician and writer. He was a member of Christelijk-Historische Unie (CHU) and later CDA. He was mayor of Workum and Sneek. He was born in Stavoren, Netherlands.
Buma died from a heart attack on 26 June 2020 at a hospital in Leeuwarden, Netherlands at the age of 88.
